flawed_nl_solution:
The truck driver can go 3 * 12 = <<3*12=36>>36 miles on the gas in his tank.
He needs to go 90 - 36 = <<90-36=57>>57 more miles.
Thus, the truck driver needs to put 57 / 3 = <<57/3=19>>19 more gallons of gas in his semi.
#### 19

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 54, not 57. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
